description.value:
Whenever the vigilante attacks an opponent with a concealed weapon that his target wasnâ€™t aware of, he can attempt a Bluff check to feint that opponent as a move action.

If he has the @Compendium[pf1.feats.tocde3sKG1O3GKgd]{Improved Feint} feat, he attempts this check as a free action instead.

A vigilante must be at least 6th level to select this talent.
